SKN1T.TL.summary: Nordic Fibreboard AS, a timber processing company, produces and sells fiberboard products. The company operates through Fibreboard Manufacturing and Sale, Furniture Retail Sale, and Real Estate Management segments. It offers insulation boards, wind barrier boards, roof boards, and underlays under the ISOPLAAT trademark, as well as interior panels, including ceiling and wall panels under the Isotex name for construction and renovation of buildings; and industrial boards. The company is also involved in the operation a chain of furniture stores in Latvia and Lithuania; and rental and property development business. It markets its products in the Nordic countries, Russia, and the Baltics. The company was formerly known as Skano Group AS and changed its name to Nordic Fibreboard AS in December 2019. Nordic Fibreboard AS is headquartered in PÃ¤rnu, Estonia.
